reply.content: I've already noticed this problem myself and with the next coming update (probably in 24hours) this is much improved, but not completely solved. There seems to be a bug in android 5.0.1 which doesn't let me change the background of the text, but I've reposisioned them in a way, that it now looks better. Thank you for your feedback by the way.
